name: Mini Of Three Kingdoms—legend of war
name_original: Mini Of Three Kingdoms—legend of war
description:
Game Description:Mini Of Three Kingdoms is a class on the background of the three classic strategy RPG card player, this is new style for you to create different eliminate mobile game.

Game Features:
Novice player with strategy, open, give you different gaming experience.
The three countries will follow choice, relaxed leisure, fingertips to play blame, strategy disposal, to create a unique team.
A variety of combat, and varied operation style, all the way through, began to belong to your face.
New PVP game waiting for you to fight, fight rhythm can't stop, acme PK, a High explosive.

Playing Method: Players in the game can be recruited to the hero of the pavilion, the various military commanders through training, and sent them to the battle battle, eventually evolved into god hero level.Can undertake various of the warrior, for transfers-will with their strategies and hand speed, even high power can also be counter attack, along with a variety of attractive woman to accompany you to play The Three Kingdoms, to challenge!
